data.actual_result: The cursor is an arrow, but click opens the mini profile
data.expected_result: Either the cursor turns into a hand to show the name is clickable, or mini profile doesn't open
data.short_description: Hovering over the names of friends in a voice channel on the activity tab shows a pointer cursor despite names being clickable
data.steps_to_repro: - Get multiple friends to join a voice channel (around 4-5) - Make sure all of them are set to show on the activity tab - Go to the activity tab and find the name of the voice channel - Hover over any of the names - Click the name
